description:
Beauties Unveiled 2 is a continuation of the mesmerizing journey from Part 1, that pairs the familiar excitement of classic arcade games with manga-inspired, and hentai-inspired art.

This time, the art style is more manga-inspired, with the quick-paced gameplay you all liked. 

Overcome ticking-clock challenges, be aware of many obstacles and opponents, choose carefully your path, and benefit from different power-ups available during each stage of the game. 
Pay attention to the obstacles that will get in your way â€“ you may have a few chances but be wary as the number of attempts is limited! To snatch the highest score, you will need reflexes, quick decisions, and a bit of luck.
name: Beauties Unveiled 2
